Recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
Recipes.shortDescription: A quick and easy Italian pasta dish using eggs, cheese, and bacon.
ingredients: Garlic clove, peeled and left whole
Recipes.instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Beat the eggs with the pecorino and parmesan. Fry the pancetta with garlic. Remove garlic and mix everything together with some butter.

Recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
Recipes.shortDescription: A hearty, spicy chili that's perfect for a cold day.
Recipes.instructions: Heat oil and add onion, peppers, and garlic. Stir in spices, then add beans and tomatoes. Simmer for 30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

Recipes.title: Classic Beef Stew
Recipes.shortDescription: Warm and comforting beef stew with vegetables.
ingredients: 2 lbs beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch pieces
Recipes.instructions: Toss beef in flour, salt, and pepper. Brown in oil. Add onions and broth. Cover and simmer for 1 hour. Add vegetables and thyme; cook until tender.

Recipes.title: Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken
Recipes.shortDescription: A flavorful roasted chicken dish with a lemon garlic sauce.
Recipes.instructions: Season chicken with salt, pepper, and paprika. Stuff with lemon and garlic. Roast at 425°F for 1.5 hours. Baste with olive oil halfway through.

Recipes.title: Avocado Toast
Recipes.shortDescription: A simple and healthy avocado toast perfect for breakfast.
Recipes.instructions: Mash avocado with salt and pepper. Spread on toasted bread. Add red pepper flakes. Top with eggs if desired.

Recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Recipes.shortDescription: A classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken breast.
Recipes.instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper, grill until cooked. Toss lettuce with dressing and Parmesan. Top with sliced chicken and croutons.

Recipes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
Recipes.shortDescription: A creamy, comforting butternut squash soup.
Recipes.instructions: Roast squash until tender. Sauté onion and apple. Blend squash, onion, apple, and broth until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in cream if using.

Recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
Recipes.shortDescription: A light and refreshing quinoa salad with vegetables and a lemon vinaigrette.
Recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa in water. Let cool. Mix with vegetables. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Pour over salad.

Recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Recipes.instructions: Whisk flour and baking soda. Beat butter and sugars. Add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Mix in flour. Fold in chocolate chips. Bake at 375°F for 10 minutes.

Recipes.title: Margarita Pizza
Recipes.shortDescription: A simple yet delicious Margarita pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil.
ingredients: Salt and olive oil, to taste
Recipes.instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Top with mozzarella. Bake at 475°F until crust is golden. Garnish with basil, salt, and olive oil.
